医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
疟原虫中发现新的调控系统东京工业大学最近协助的一项研究发现，顶质体（疟原虫恶性疟原虫中的一种细胞器）内的基因表达受到宿主血液中褪黑激素（昼夜节律信号激素）和内在寄生虫信号的调节，通过一种称为 ApSigma 的因子。世界研究中心倡议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-regulatory-system-discovered-in-malaria-parasite.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-regulatory-system-discovered-in-malaria-parasite.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8f1608b-c9c7-43d3-b97b-57fe1f93e1dd Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:58:37 -0400 New regulatory system discovered in malaria parasite
新方法可以提高液体活检测试的准确性由加州大学洛杉矶分校大卫格芬医学院病理学和实验医学教授周向红博士领导的研究小组在解决无细胞 DNA (cfDNA) 检测的主要挑战之一方面取得了重要进展，称为液体活检。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-approach-could-improve-accuracy-of-liquid-biopsy-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-approach-could-improve-accuracy-of-liquid-biopsy-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6aed6043-610e-41ae-806d-14d36cde89de Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:54:48 -0400 New approach could improve accuracy of liquid biopsy tests
AGC 激酶基序突变与结直肠癌生长相关癌症以狡猾的、近乎军国主义的方式在人体中传播。例如，它可以操纵我们的基因组成，接管特定的细胞间信号传导过程，并使关键酶发生突变，以促进肿瘤生长，抵抗治疗，并加速其从原始部位扩散到血液或其他器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Mutations-in-AGC-kinase-motif-linked-to-colorectal-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Mutations-in-AGC-kinase-motif-linked-to-colorectal-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba9ce9f1-4d35-4caa-8acf-35c89c010c03 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:49:41 -0400 Mutations in AGC kinase motif linked to colorectal cancer growth
新型口腔膜可以彻底改变患者的药物输送传统的给药方式——吞咽药片、服用苦味糖浆、注射或直肠插入——可能会让一些患者感到痛苦和不愉快，尤其是幼儿或老年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-oral-films-could-revolutionize-drug-delivery-for-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-oral-films-could-revolutionize-drug-delivery-for-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4a59bdc-7c46-4e6d-ac4d-63bba9c7c863 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:41:02 -0400 New oral films could revolutionize drug delivery for patients
研究显示痴呆症患者仍然可以学习新事物尽管患有痴呆症，但患有痴呆症的人仍然有能力学习新事物。这是瑞典林雪平大学最近发表的一篇博士论文的结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Dementia-Is-Not-The-End-Of-Learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Dementia-Is-Not-The-End-Of-Learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f217e3a2-2897-4bab-939a-598bf62712c6 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:34:00 -0400 Dementia patients can still learn new things, study shows
基于 CRISPR/Cas9 的筛选确定了非酒精性脂肪肝的潜在疗法NRF2 转录因子的激活有望成为非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 的潜在治疗方法，NAFLD 是一种与氧化应激和肝损伤相关的疾病。通过筛选 FDA 批准的药物，研究人员发现了六种能够增强 NRF2 活性并表现出针对氧化应激和脂质积累的保护作用的化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/CRISPRCas9-based-screening-identizes-potential-therapies-for-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/CRISPRCas9-based-screening-identizes-potial-therapies-for-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55fcd77d-f99f-4bd3-b9f9-83e99e0af311 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:34:00 -0400 CRISPR/Cas9-based screening identifies potential therapies for non-alcoholic fatty liver disease
研究发现，教育和社区接触可以提高农村地区的母乳喂养率虽然配方奶喂养婴儿是一种安全且方便的选择，但研究表明，自然母乳喂养对母亲和孩子的健康都有很多好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Education-and-community-exposure-can-increase-breastfeeding-rates-in-rural-areas-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Education-and-community-exposure-can-increase-breastfeeding-rates-in-rural-areas-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b560354-8504-49d3-8217-b4aca42e1e84 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:32:00 -0400 Education and community exposure can increase breastfeeding rates in rural areas, study finds
SIRT1：通过白藜芦醇和能量限制解开改善血管健康的秘密研究调查了通过补充白藜芦醇和能量限制激活 SIRT1 对成人血管功能的影响。研究表明，这两种干预措施都会增加循环 SIRT1，减少交感神经活动，并对血管反应性产生积极影响，表明对血管健康具有潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/SIRT1-Unlocking-the-secrets-to-better-angio-health-through-resveratrol-and-energy-restriction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/SIRT1-Unlocking-the-secrets-to-better-angio-health-through-resveratrol-and-energy-restriction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e00489a-d112-43f1-80cc-3c6d2b6d7607 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:25:00 -0400 SIRT1: Unlocking the secrets to better vascular health through resveratrol and energy restriction
研究表明更年期激素治疗会增加患痴呆症和阿尔茨海默氏症的风险研究调查了更年期激素治疗对患痴呆症风险的影响，考虑了不同类型的激素治疗、使用持续时间和使用年龄。该研究旨在评估激素治疗与痴呆症发展之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Study-links-menopausal-hormone-therapy-to-increased-risk-of-dementia-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Study-links-menopausal-hormone-therapy-to-increased-risk-of-dementia-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f0ccea-edbb-494d-9930-abd7c438d054 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 22:13:00 -0400 Study links menopausal hormone therapy to increased risk of dementia and Alzheimer's
对于阿尔茨海默氏症患者来说，阻力训练可能是一种简单且负担得起的疗法定期的体育锻炼，例如阻力训练，可以预防阿尔茨海默病，或者至少延缓症状的出现，并且是阿尔茨海默病患者一种简单且负担得起的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Resistance-training-could-be-a-simple-and-affordable-therapy-for-Alzheimers-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Resistance-training-could-be-a-simple-and-affordable-therapy-for-Alzheimers-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc388b6-1bf1-4976-81b0-dcfa46440f96 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 21:43:38 -0400 Resistance training could be a simple and affordable therapy for Alzheimer's patients
